name: Harbor City
culture_adjustments: stronger guild authority over civic life
bilingual trading argot (Coastal Tongues + Island Creole) dominant
practical seamanship prioritized over augury in training
public performance of shanties and port folklore
merchant networks enable greater social mobility
constraints: naval defenses constrained by shallow approaches
notes: ritual labs and reagent stores clustered in guarded warehouses
guild charters tightly regulate shipwright labor and reagent distribution
